description: Statistical Capacity Building for MDG monitoring and reporting

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1) Statistical monitoring capacities of line ministries and governmental agencies are strengthened through participatory approach
2) Awareness and knowledge the government officials, business people, civil society and the public on MDGs (both global and national) and WISP progress is increased
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: MDG Statistics Project

title: MDG Statistics Project
